Articles.Content:
Has anyone found an in-game April Fool's joke? I don't think there is because I didn't notice any update, but someone can prove me wrong if they've seen one.

> 
> Everyone's a moderator today (green name and "moderator" description) and it's pretty funny, especially the people who don't notice.
> 
> 

Edit: Found some more.

This photo on KSP's facebook page:

[https://www.facebook.com/kerbalspaceprogram/photos/a.240767269275838.66315.240760572609841/964750840210807/?type=1](https://www.facebook.com/kerbalspaceprogram/photos/a.240767269275838.66315.240760572609841/964750840210807/?type=1)

Scott Manley's video previewing the mach effects with the new aero:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EWMPS8ji2GA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T00:37:08Z" title="04/02/2015 12:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by sdj64**
I don't know what you're talking about. Harvester approached me himself and said he wanted me to be the one mod to rule them all.
it's raining moderators oh god

Waaait a minute...

I sense ninjas!
Definitely no nyancats in my install.
the problem is that i cant delete posts and threads...and ban all the people...

> 
> the problem is that i cant delete posts and threads...and ban all the people...

It is unfortunate that we cannot.

Obviously the Staff saw just how awesome of a member I am with my limited number of posts and rep, and decided to give me full mod powers!

\*Insert Evil Laughter Here\*

> 
> the problem is that i cant delete posts and threads...and ban all the people...

Working fine for me.
I have noticed that some people's avatars (and even some sig pics) have been replaced with hand drawn versions of themselves. Of course that could be completely unrelated but I just noticed it today.

> 
> I have noticed that some people's avatars (and even some sig pics) have been replaced with hand drawn versions of themselves. Of course that could be completely unrelated but I just noticed it today.

They're not hand-drawn, that's camera shake.

> 
> They're not hand-drawn, that's camera shake.

Or perhaps old school paint.
Im... a moderator
The reason you all still have your accounts is because I'm nice enough to not delete them from the database. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> The reason you all still have your accounts is because I'm nice enough to not delete them from the database. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Thanks dude!! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> The reason you all still have your accounts is because I'm nice enough to not delete them from the database. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

As soon as I find anything that goes against the ToS though, first a warning. If it continues, bye-bye account.
What is happening!

> 
> What is happening!

The apocalypse. The apocalypse is happening.
death to comic sans!

Hmmm...I must lodge a complaint: As Wielder of the Forum Ban-Hammer, I seem to have been issued an apparently ineffective Nerf, foam ban-hammer....

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T17:47:12Z" title="04/01/2015 05:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by Stone Blue**

> 
> They're not hand-drawn, that's 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RtGfDnY3mZw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> .

ftfy.

**INFINITE POWER FOR ALL!**

warning: mileage may vary, power may be so finite as to be uncountably small.
I don't know if it's the game or a mod but all my waypoints are Nyan Cats.

> 
> I don't know if it's the game or a mod but all my waypoints are Nyan Cats.

Off-topic, are you *really* director of QA?

> 
> Definitely no nyancats in my install.

[![jJHLESC.png](http://i.imgur.com/jJHLESC.png)](http://imgur.com/jJHLESC)
